question: Which of the following statements about Pressure and Stress is NOT correct?
option1: Pressure is always normal to the area
option2: Pressure is always compressive in nature
option3: Stress can be normal or tangential to the area
option4: Stress is always compressive in nature
answer: Stress is always compressive in nature
explanation: Pressure is always normal to the area but Stress can be normal or tangential to the area. Pressure is always compressive in nature but Stress may be compressive or tensile in nature.
